relation: Great for these types of students
Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
Non existent but at a 250 person girls school, it might as well be a giant sorority.
We've got Big Sis/Lil Sis, Ring Day....full of wonderful traditions!
There's plenty of fun - wing events, dorm events, campus events, terre haute events!
Dorm rooms are large with heat and air conditioning, wood floors. Being renovated a few rooms at a time. Decent living.
Some programs are hard and others are not. Maths and sciences are very challenging, others are not.
If you don't like hanging out with other girls....this isn't the school for you!
St. Mary-of-the-Woods is a great school with a good atmosphere. We have small classes, lots of one-on-one interaction with the professors. Plus, we have horses!
pageTitle: Saint Mary-of-the-Woods College (SMWC) Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

textAfterTable: Comments Great for these types of students This is an all women's school, and is perfect for the student that does not want to get lost in the crowd. Since SMWC is so small all of your teachers know you and remember you. A student that has struggled in high school wont fall between the crack because professors make sure that the student has used all of the tools possible and more. Tips for prospective students Always ask if it is possible to do an overnight and sit in on a class or two. The most important class to sit in on would be a major class if you know what your intended major will be. Stay in contact with the admissions office and don't be afraid to ask questions. If an overnight is possible, stay in contact with the hosting student. That way you have a student that you will know as well when you start in the fall. Bang for the buck The quality of education that you get is well worth it. The services that you have to use at you disposal while you are a student and the ones that you have available after graduation are incredibly valuable. The career center alone will bend over backwards to make sure that you have the chance to
